title: Bacon Pasta Bake
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon grated Parmesan cheese or as needed', '450g penne pasta', '450g thick rashers streaky bacon, cut into 1.25cm pieces', '50g butter', '1 small onion, chopped', '5 tablespoons plain flour', '950ml milk', '1 teaspoon dried thyme leaves', 'sea salt and cracked black pepper to taste', '4 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese', '400g grated mature Cheddar cheese, divided']
